mapper.insert:
select schedule_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SC_NUM, MEM_ID, S_DATE, E_DATE, H_DAY1_CID, H_DAY2_CID, H_DAY3_CID, H_DAY4_CID, H_DAY5_CID, T_DAY1_CID, T_DAY2_CID, T_DAY3_CID, T_DAY4_CID, T_DAY5_CID) VALUES(#{scNum},#{memId},#{sDate},#{eDate}, #{hDay1Cid}, #{hDay2Cid}, #{hDay3Cid}, #{hDay4Cid}, #{hDay5Cid}, #{tDay1Cid}, #{tDay2Cid}, #{tDay3Cid}, #{tDay4Cid}, #{tDay5Cid})
